channel.title: Research on SEO News
channel.description: Recent content in Research on SEO News

item.title: Google Knowledge Graph query automation
item.description: I’ve found what I think are some new and better ways to query Google Knowledge Graph data and see how you’re doing for SEO on select terms. I’m speaking about this method at PubCon 2019 in Las Vegas, October 9th, and will release a tool at the time as well (for free!). The technique should work for a while, I’m not doing anything ‘bad’ though I doubt Google intended this to work… maybe they’ll rate limit these calls or something.
